EmailTemplate.name: BHAR Youth Board Sessions Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Youth Board Session Dates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Please see below the details of your upcoming Youth Board sessions. They will all be taking place at Frenford Clubs, The Drive, Ilford IG1 3PS.
Monday 18th January, 5pm - 7pm Monday 1st February, 4.30pm - 6.30pm Monday 8th February, 4.30pm - 6.30pm Monday 15th February, 4.30pm - 6.30pm Monday 29th February, 4.30pm - 6.30pm Saturday 5th March - NCS Action Day
If you are not able to attend any of these sessions, please let me know by replying to this email.
Kind regards,
Hannah Kinghorn The Challenge
